metadata.reset: To Reset Homey to factory defaults, place Homey upside down. After a few seconds, Homey will initiate a countdown (both visually in the LED ring and verbally through voice) of 15 seconds. After the countdown had ended, browse on a computer, laptop or tablet to setup.athom.com to initiate a new setup. PLEASE USE THE RESET PROCEDURE ONLY IF YOU EXPERIENCE SEVERE DIFFICULTIES WITH HOMEY'S OPERATING SYSTEM OR WHEN ADVISED TO DO SO BY ATHOM SUPPORT
